content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to refuel burner entities before using them
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using steam engines but having no input liquid
-  Ensure that steam engines have the required input liquid before starting the engine
### Errors when using boilers but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to refuel boilers before using them
### Errors when using offshore pumps but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure that offshore pumps have the required fluid present in connections before starting the pump
